title: Blondy the Young Inventor
backCoverBlurb: Blondy loves building things and science experiments. She wants to invent something that helps peopleâ€”maybe a robot! Join her in her workshop.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy smile. She is wearing blue denim overalls and has a pencil tucked behind her ear.

pages.text: Blondy's room was full of boxes, gears, and lots of tape.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with curly blonde hair surrounded by craft supplies.

pages.text: I want to build a robot friend! Blondy said with a smile.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy looking enthusiastically at a drawing of a robot.

pages.text: She found a silver box and some old, shiny bicycle lights.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy holding a metallic box and looking through a junk drawer.

pages.text: Blondy worked all afternoon, building and fixing and taping.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy working hard with a small screwdriver and colorful wire.

pages.text: Finally, the robot was ready. Its eyes glowed bright red.
pages.imagePrompt: A small robot made of boxes with glowing red eye lights.

pages.text: Hello, Blondy! said the robot. My name is Sparky.
pages.imagePrompt: The robot standing in front of Blondy, looking friendly.

pages.text: Sparky helpfully tidied up all the blocks on the floor.
pages.imagePrompt: The robot picking up colorful wooden blocks and putting them away.

pages.text: Wow! My invention really works! Blondy cried with joy.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy clapping her hands and looking amazed.

pages.text: Being an inventor means you can solve any problem.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with a confident and proud expression, blue eyes sparkling.

pages.text: Blondy was already thinking about her next great idea.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy tapping her chin, looking thoughtful.

pages.text: The workshop was a place where anything was possible.
pages.imagePrompt: A sunny view of Blondy's organized craft area.

pages.text: Goodnight, Blondy. Tomorrow you will build something new!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sleeping with Sparky the robot standing guard.
